name: Lissen Ta Me, Cos I'z Da Biggest

system.effect: The Ork can now use Might Makes Right Trait (Can use Intimidate to perform all functions of Command) on Non Orks as well as Orks, and can affect a number of creatures with Might Makes Right equal to 10x Strength Bonus.

description.value: The Ork can now use Might Makes Right Trait (Can use Intimidate to perform all functions of Command) on Non Orks as well as Orks, and can affect a number of creatures with Might Makes Right equal to 10x Strength Bonus.
